tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My father in law had a serious issue with his spine. He underwent a spine stabilization surgery ** ******  ******** ****** **** in August 2019. Which was an absolute lost cause. We wnet back to again and again to set it right, but to no avail.
By November of 2019 he was almost laid up in bed.. at this time only we were referred to Dr. Muralidaran at apollo hospital Perungudi. We mde an appointment with him and he explained to us in very clear manner what the problem was and also what can be done to set it right.. 
We were sceptical about under going such a mjor surgery again with in 6 months time , considering his 73 years age. 
But Dr. Muralidaran was very confident that it can be performed with very minlmal risk...which in turn gave us confidence m.
He had advised us ,how best the surgery can be done and he had told us that with in 6- 8 weeks he will be able to walk.
Cages and screws were put along the spine at 8 levels . He was in the hospital for 5 days and then he was back home. Where he recaptured very well. As assured by the doctor he was able to walk with help of walker  in 2-3  weeks with in 8 weeks he was able to walk well. 
After surgery visits were also hassle free.. we are so relieved now. He is walking much better with out support and he is able to perform all his work by himself. He had prescribed very little medicine always advising that taking lots of medicine is not good in the long run.
He is also always available if we have any issues or doubt. Very approachable.
We are very thankful to Dr. Muralidaran for his help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I went to Doctor Mr.Muralidhran Venkatesan for my 14 old daughter who had Adolescent Idiopathic Scoliosis. His approach is very good. We tend to forget the painful condition and feel confident. We are very much satisfied with his line of treatment. He is quite friendly and affectionate. “Felt that I got the best possible treatment for my daughter and owe my life to the Doctor Mr.Muralidhran. He is awesome, very caring and concerned. I always feel like I get plenty of time to explain my daughter issues without feeling rushed. Very professional and  practical. He cleared the fear around misconception. Promoted a positive approach and patiently clarified the doubts of my daughter. He does with extra care and done the surgery with latest technology and best equipments available in the market today.
Thanks for your good care and concern…Your 'manner' put myself and my daughter at ease and helped me to gain confidence. Because of you, my daughter is doing very well. I am very happy with the way my daughter have been treated. Thanks for everything.....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We truly had a great experience interacting with Dr Muralidharan who was extremely kind, considerate, honest and helpful. He and his colleague suggested us to consult an Oncologist. Dr Muralidharan said he would happy to meet or speak with the Oncologist to explain about the patient's condition and his assessment once we let him know who and when we would visit the Oncologist. When I called on his mobile, at a relatively short notice, to let him know about our Oncologist appointment, he immediately answered the call and since we were going to another Apollo hospital where Dr Muralidharan was going to perform a surgery, he said he would quickly drop by to meet with the Oncologist. As promised he arrived before our appointment and took time to explain to the Oncologist about the patient. Later in the afternoon he called to follow up with us. Dr Muralidharan was totally professional in his approach and was very clear in explaining the situation/diagnosis which was easy to understand. Despite being highly qualified, well experienced and a specialist, Dr Muralidharan was very kind and supportive. Thank you so much doctor for your kind support and great experience.
reply_text: Thanks for your time on feedback...

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
I was beyond impressed with my experience with  Dr.Muralidharan spine surgeon. My first contact with  Dr.Muralidharan made me completely blown away by how helpful and kind he was and how fast he was at getting back to find solution for the problem.
Now on the appointment, it ran on time,  Dr.Muralidharan *** ****** ************* ** ***** *** ***** ******* ****** *** made me feel comfortable throughout the appointment
Coming to the main picture, I had a severe leg pain and was unable to walk even a single step, consulted few medical college professors and leading orthos in the city but none could  help me to sort out the issue. Most of them advised pain killers for temporary relief. 
But when I visited Dr.Muralidharan spine surgeon at Chennai Ortho and Spine Center, Adyar he took time and carefully analysed and found out the underlying issue, it was a compressed sciatic nerve that was causing severe pain on my thigh while walking. He explained the whole problem taking time and also advised the practical dos and donts that I need to follow to avoid the problem in future. 
He advised me few physio exercise and vitamin tablets, I recovered 80% the very next day and within a week I was able to do my routines and other tasks regularly.
One of the best thing is, he is extremely knowledgeable and dedicated and is not money motive. He charges a very reasonable cost for the care and service he offers. He takes time for each patient until finding the underlying cause and solution for the same.
If you are looking for a doctor whose medical knowledge is encyclopedic, treats the whole person, and takes the time to be caring even while maintaining a very efficient office, then Dr.Muralidharan is the right person
I would definitely recommend him to anyone that values their health and find the solution for the spine and ortho related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ************ ** *** *** **** ***** ********* Clear and confident approach towards answering our doubts distinguishes him from others. I Am an engineer from Dubai. And I had planned to travel to Chennai for my L5-S1 spine surgery, Dr. Muralidharan agreed for my request on a very short notice. And after the successful surgery I have returned back to Dubai in just two weeks time. And have resumed my duty a week after. The doctor is highly competent and his expertise is immense. I would Strongly suggest the doctorto those who are looking for spine surgeon
reply_text: Thanks Nethaji for your feedback... Good to hear your speedy recovery

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My wife R.Vasantha 65 years old was suffering from low back pain.  She could not even sit, even for taking lunch/ dinner. Pain was extreme for the last two years. As she was 65, I hesitate,  even to consult any surgeon for the long two years. Finally , I consulted, different ortho surgeons on the issue , but none explained , after examination of the patient.  Finally, I came to know of Mr. Muralidharan and consulted him. He explained in detail and also, informed us, what he proposed to do about the problem.  He gave us full confidence about the surgery. Finally,  we agreed to the surgery, which was performed by Dr.Muralidharan and his team,in Apollo specialty hospital,  perungudi.
Now my wife R.Vasantha 65, is NOT having any pain, and she is able to walk, sit and do her work with ease.
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback. Stay safe!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thank you Dr.Muralidharan sir for the successful surgery on my back. All the leg pain is gone. It’s great to feel this good again. It’s been a little over 4 months now since my surgery and I feel better than I have in years. My only regret is that I didn’t see you 3 years ago. Thanks again for restoring my quality of life and adding a bunch of miles to my bones! Our questions are always answered with great patience on your part. I really appreciate that. We are so fortunate to have you and your team always ready to help us. Thanks for being there.Your patient,
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback and best wishes for continued recovery

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am Himadri Sanyal from Kolkata, W. B.  went to Channai to met with Dr.Muralidharan Venkatesan for my 17  years old brother's spine fusion surgery. It was a successful operation. Now my brother is completely fine. Dr.Muralidharan V is very friendly, affectionate, very professional and practical. ** ** ********* ** *** ****** He preferres patient comfort and demand  very much. He arranged for the oparation within very short time solving critical situation. I was shocked to see my brother was walking after 10 hours of oparation. Best thing is that Dr.Muralidharan V  communicate direct to the patient even after a long time of discharge. I am thankful to him for his good care and concern. 
    ** *** *** * *** *** ****  *** ************ * ** *** ** *** **** ***** ******** ** ***** ***  I would definitely recommend him to anyone that values their health and find the solutions for the spine and ortho related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Muralidharan is very humble, explains each and everything very patiently, clarify all our doubts. He will not prescribe unnecessary medications or treatment. Simply he is down to earth.

I had multiple fractures after delivery. Saw few orthopaedic dr's, but none helped me. My cousin only referred Dr Muralidharan, he gave the right treatment and my fractures are getting healed. Immense Thanks to Dr Muralidharan.

review: Doctor Murali is extremely helpful and a great surgeon. My mother had tremendous pain in her spine due to metastatic lung cancer. However, as per Dr. Murali's suggestion and immediate surgery on detection, my mother has got absolut relief from pain. She's completely able to walk after a week from the date of surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: To sum up in one word “Extraordinary” service by Dr Muralidharan Venkatesan at Apollo hospital. My mother visited many clinics, consulted many doctors and no one could diagnose in systematic way that Dr Muralidharan Venkatesan done and most importantly he quickly identified root cause of the issue. Furthermore, his positive approach provided more confidence to my mother. I would highly recommend Dr Muralidharan Venkatesan to anyone who needs Spinal care.
reply_text: Thank your taking time to provide feedback.. Much appreciated

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mother went through spinal surgery at Apollo specialty hospitals at OMR Chennai this year during February month. Dr V Muralidharan – Spine Surgeon had done surgery. After surgery my mother could recovery completely at the age of 71. I can say “Dr V Muralidharan has given second birth to my mother”.  **** * ************ *** **** *** ***** **** **** ********** Particularly the doctor was more friendly and took care of his patient very well, we could approach the doctor easily.

I wish the management and Doctor do well for upcoming Patients via like services which we got for my mother.

 All the best for your services.

Regards
Rajesh
reply_text: Thanks Rajesh for your time and feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Muralidharan Sir is indeed a great combination of Knowledge, Proffessionalism and best patient care. He is very kind , polite and supportive. My brother, just 26 underwent MLD in some other hospital in march, improved,but within one month he was bed ridden again and was a lost surgery. Then we came to know about Dr. Muralidharan Sir, we visited sir at COSC, he gives optimum time and explains everything in simplest way possible..his confidence gave us positive hopes, finally sir did surgery at apollo hospital 1 month back and my brother is recovering well. Best part is, unlike others sir takes care of patient even after surgery till full recovery and hence post-op follow up is very easy. Sir is always available to clear if we have any doubts. Our experience with sir was beyond expectations..Thank u so much Sir for ur immense help in our tough times

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had consultation with Dr. Muralidharan for my lower back pain. He is friendly approachable person and way of explaining the problem was excellent. 
Detailed explanation of medication and treatment gives us confidence to overcome it. Also suggesting life style changes like sitting posture and stretching our body are commendable . I would highly recommend to my friends and relatives.
reply_text: Thanks Balaji for taking time to leave your feedback

I was 63 yrs old with heart and Rheumatoid problems when I under went Total knee replacement in both the knees. Doctor encouraged me 
And gave a friendly kind attention to all patients. Now I can walk without a stick.
May God bless him
